title: Bloome 4pk Plug-In + 22 Assorted Plug In Refills Scented Oil Air Freshener 20ml - Fragranced Oil Air Fresheners for Home, Bedroom, Office, Pet Odours, Kitchen, and Room Freshness
features: 4 Inviting Scents to Suit Your Mood – Includes Cotton Fresh, Freesia & Magnolia, Lavender Meadow, and Raspberry & Passion Fruit. A scent for every season and every space.
Easy Plug-In Design – Designed to fit standard UK wall sockets. Just insert a refill, plug in, and enjoy the gradual release of fragrance throughout your home.

Consistent Fragrance with Every Refill – Includes 22 assorted plug-in refills, each lasting up to 28 days. Enjoy a long-lasting scent that adds warmth and freshness to any room—perfect for the bedroom, kitchen, living area, or hallway.
Helps Neutralise Everyday Odours – Ideal for busy households, these plug-ins help tackle unwanted smells and keep your home feeling fresh and welcoming.
Sleek and Subtle Design – With a modern look that blends into any décor, Bloome plug-in air fresheners offer a low-profile way to elevate your home atmosphere.
description: Product Description Previous page Next page Shop Our Product Range 4pk Plug In + 22 Refills Add To Basket 4pk Wall Plug In Add To Basket 4pk Plug In + 11 Refills Add To Basket 12pk Tower Gel Freshener Add To Basket 24pk Tower Gel Freshener Add To Basket 12pk Dehumidifier Bags Add To Basket 24pk Dehumidifier Bags Add To Basket Customer Reviews — — — 2.9 out of 5 stars 3 1.0 out of 5 stars 1 3.9 out of 5 stars 593 3.7 out of 5 stars 135 Price £24.99 £ 24 . 99 £9.99 £ 9 . 99 £14.99 £ 14 . 99 £14.99 £ 14 . 99 £24.99 £ 24 . 99 £7.99 £ 7 . 99 £12.99 £ 12 . 99 Suitable for Any Space ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Giftable ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Compact Design ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Easy to Use ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Long-Lasting Performance ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ How do I use the plug-in air freshener starter kit? Simply insert the refill into the plug-in unit, plug into a socket, and enjoy immediate fragrance. Works with standard UK sockets and fits neatly into any room. Which rooms is this plug in air freshener suitable for? Perfect for bedrooms, kitchens, living rooms, bathrooms, and offices. It's a strong house air freshener that adds a cosy, inviting feel anywhere. What scents are available with the plug in refills? Choose from Cotton Fresh, Freesia & Magnolia, Lavender Meadow, or Raspberry & Passion Fruit for a fresh, room-lifting experience. Will this plug in air freshener help reduce unwanted odours? Yes, it acts as a dual-purpose air freshener and pet odour eliminator, helping remove smells while adding a fresh, comfortable fragrance. Is this plug in air freshener kit compatible with all devices? The refills are designed for use with Bloome plug in air freshener units and fit most standard UK plug-in diffuser devices for home use.
